author: berlingske.dk
title: Ground News - Everyone knew that Noah “lived in a bubble.” On Christmas night he killed his wife and their four children
text:
Summary by berlingske.dk All the alarm bells rang before the Christmas fivefold killings in France, but no one heeded. Local politicians are furious at the collective failure, and women's organisations accuse President Macron of being “totally indifferent”. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right

Local politicians are furious at the collective failure, and women's organisations accuse President Macron of being “totally indifferent”.
